definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: A sinusoidal waveform provides the structural silhouette shape across the channel.
sentences.chinese: 正弦波形赋予了通过水道的结构轮廓的形状。

sentences.english: Since sine waves vary continuously, they are examples of analog waves.
sentences.chinese: 因为正弦波连续地改变，他们是类比式波动的例子。

sentences.english: Through the test of sine wave sweep, the character of response of aeolian sand due to motivation is gained.
sentences.chinese: 利用正弦波扫频试验，得到风积沙对激励的响应特性。

sentences.english: These two sinusoids are nearly out of phase.
sentences.chinese: 这两个正弦波几乎是反相的。

sentences.english: In the production practice, will encounter a large number of non-sine wave .
sentences.chinese: 在生产实践中，会遇到大量的非正弦波。

sentences.english: The sinusoid frequency estimation algorithms for all phase spectrum analysis are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了应用于全相位频谱分析的正弦波频率估计算法。

sentences.english: Square waves, like sine waves, are periodic.
sentences.chinese: 方波如正弦波一样是周期性的。

sentences.english: The nonlinear wave shape degenerates to a sinusoidal wave.
sentences.chinese: 增加三个正弦波可形成一个复合波。

sentences.english: Next, imagine the combination of several sine waves.
sentences.chinese: 接著，想像有数个正弦波的组合。

sentences.english: AC sine-wave voltage between electrodes enables stable detection with no electric corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 交流正弦波电压使电极之间的电腐蚀，无稳定的检测。

sentences.english: RC sinusoidal oscillator circuit based on second-generation current conveyors is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于电流传送器的RC正弦波振荡电路。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new active—R sinewave oscillator consisting of two operatinal ampli- fiefs(OAs)and resistors is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出并论述了一种新的有源电阻正弦波振荡器。

sentences.english: Alignment fields consist of very low distortion sinusoidal waves.
sentences.chinese: 排队过程包含很低的扭曲的正弦波。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
harmonic (wave with frequency an integer multiple of the fundamental)
